name: Priyanka
intro: Stockholm-based frontend developer studying at <highlight>Hyper Island</highlight> and currently interning at <highlight>Swirl</highlight>. At Swirl, I contributed to <link>Haus</link>, a financial health web app built with <highlight>Next.js</highlight>, <highlight>Neon</highlight>, and <highlight>Vercel</highlight>. I love building modern, user-focused interfaces with <highlight>React</highlight> and <highlight>TypeScript</highlight>, and I am starting to build mobile UIs with <highlight>Flutter</highlight>.
focusDescription: Improving Haus in production, learning Flutter by adding new screens to my first mobile app, and deepening my experience with Next.js, TypeScript, and modern deployment tools like Vercel and Neon.
